body_html:
Is there a formal dependence of tensorflow on numpy (and if yes, which version)? If I could use numpy 1.14, the numpy function einsum_path [1] could be used to implement this.

[1] https://docs.scipy.org/doc/numpy/reference/generated/numpy.einsum_path.html
body_text:
Is there a formal dependence of tensorflow on numpy (and if yes, which version)? If I could use numpy 1.14, the numpy function einsum_path [1] could be used to implement this.
[1] https://docs.scipy.org/doc/numpy/reference/generated/numpy.einsum_path.html
body:
Is there a formal dependence of tensorflow on numpy (and if yes, which version)? If I could use numpy 1.14, the numpy function `einsum_path` [1] could be used to implement this.

[1] https://docs.scipy.org/doc/numpy/reference/generated/numpy.einsum_path.html
